query: Do the expert reports identify contradictions in Gulfstream's methodology?
output:
CLAUDE CODE ANALYSIS
Query: Do the expert reports identify contradictions in Gulfstream's methodology?

RELEVANT DOCUMENT EXCERPTS:

[Bassim Draft Witness Statement.docx, p.1]
Before the Aircraft was delivered to St. Louis, my pilot Mr. Schouten reached out to Mr. Danny Farnham for his assistance, as an owner's representative, in monitoring Gulfstream's service of the Aircraft. I first met Mr. Farnham in connection with the sale of the Challenger aircraft, and have known him for about seven years. He has also assisted me in connection with other aircraft maintenance events, including the 144-month inspection of this Aircraft at Gulfstream Savannah. I trust his expertise and diligence.

[Bassim Draft Witness Statement.docx, p.1]
In summary, CITIOM entrusted its Aircraft to Gulfstream, the OEM, for a major inspection based on a proposal that proved to be grossly misleading in terms of cost and downtime. Gulfstream failed to utilize its own data and expertise to provide a realistic estimate, failed to properly manage the project, suffered from significant staffing and efficiency issues at its St. Louis facility, failed to adequately address corrosion issues from prior maintenance, and ultimately caused CITIOM significant financial and operational damages through extraordinary delays and cost overruns. Their failure to meet the repeatedly promised June 21, 2024 return date directly caused the collapse of a lucrative sale agreement, resulting in a further loss of approximately $1 million upon the eventual sale of the Aircraft.

[Danny Farnham Direct Outline with Cross & Redirect.docx, p.1]
Witness Role: Expert in Maintenance, Repair, and Overhaul (MRO) operations

[Danny Farnham Direct Outline with Cross & Redirect.docx, p.1]
I. Expert Qualifications and Assignment Scope

[Danny Farnham Direct Outline with Cross & Redirect.docx, p.1]
Were you retained to provide expert opinions in this arbitration?

[Danny Farnham Direct Outline with Cross & Redirect.docx, p.1]
In your expert opinion, how did Gulfstream’s conduct compare with typical MRO performance in similar events?

[Full Prelim Cross List.docx, p.1]
Leonard Beauchemin – Expert Witness for Gulfstream

[Full Prelim Cross List.docx, p.1]
I. Expert Bias and Lack of Site Involvement

[Claimant CITIOM Pre-Hearing Brief - Apr 14 2025 (1).pdf, p.2]
profit. (Amended Statement of Claim ("ASOC") ¶¶ 1, 8-12, 35-44; Farnham Expert Report
